attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petiton is to bring back national service, to bring a end to youth crime and people who claim benefits that are wasting taxpayers money to bring a better image in the uk

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?ha=1157&sc=number10&qt=national+service
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
